English_Text: I don't have enough to pay you. (Lie)
Gain Access to Thiefguild Area (Not joining)
The Outlaws are good people and you are their friend. (Suggest)
Calaan does not exist. Your god is a lie! (Suggest)
I've found out who was doing the smuggling. (Betray Shorty)
Why do you want to look at that? (Show Xander's claw)
Why do you want to look at that? (Show Rat's claw)
I know who is trying to smuggle weapons into the Domed City. (Betray Paige)
Think about it, they pay well. (Bribe Rider)
Want to buy some Cleric's weapons? (Show weapons)
I have what you wanted. (Hand over Arvid's teachings)
I have a suspect for you. (Accuse Shorty)
You want me to demand that you give me the supply? (Threaten Shorty)
Here's a grenade launcher from the farm. Is that what you wanted? (Show weapon)
Brabak is right. You're a total waste of skin. (Provoke Riley)
You need to learn respect for others. (Provoke Brabak)
You're going to pay me. Now. (Threaten)
I am a Cleric, they are now my people. (Attack Radok)
You are back in business. (Hand over weapons delivery)
I have had enough of you. (Attack Trevor)
Wrong. Your time just ran out. (Attack Trevor)
Here, I found these. (Show Cleric weapons)
I want my shards back. (Provoke Iron Madison)
Cindy, she wants you dead. (Betray Cindy)
Why do you want to look at that? (Show Katta's claw)
Here is the Elexit for Frank. (Pay ransom)
I'm not telling you a thing. (Provoke Iron Madison)
Here, how about a drink? A toast to your future in charge of the Fort. (Drug Big Jim)
(Give Gunn a big chunk of shards)
We should drink to it. (Offer a beer)
Give me what you found. (Rob Ethan)
Want to see what I found in the canyon? (Hand over blueprints)
Well, you don't have to fight now, all you have to do is hand over everything you have. (Rob Ethan)
I won't do business with you. (Attack Bigby)
I brought you some bread. (Give moldy bread)
How about you stop eating people and work with me? (Negotiate)
Kill me? It's you who's going to die. (Attack Arx)
Start CSShowdownWithHybrid nur über console: goto Tarek
Set Ulbricht Ready for Ulbrichts Battle
Make Zardom ready for chapter change3
I came to do a job. (Attack Kral)
The murderer isn't anyone from Goliet. (Lie)
I didn't see any Albs. I didn't see anyone. (Lie)
You know counterfeit IDs are being sold right in front of your gate? (Show ID card)
I heard your secret society was just a group of thieves was operating from outside the gates. (Lie)
Set all GameEvents for OUT First Rank by William
Set all GameEvents for OUT Third Rank by William
Set all GameEvents for OUT Second Rank by William
How about you pay me and give your word? (Provoke a fight)
Yes, let's begin the attack. (Attack together)
You will leave Arva and her friend in peace. (Attack Sardoz)
He knows his way around technology, and I'd say his loyalty is to technology, not his faction. (Lie)
You should keep silent. It's too risky to guess. (Decide to help Caleb)
Go to the Clerics and tell them you made a mistake. (Decide to help Fenk)
No, he didn't. (Do not give counterfeit ID card)
Yes, I have something for you. (Give counterfeit ID card)
Do it for free, or I'll put you out of your misery right here, right now. (Threaten)

You're a waste of skin. You might as well die. (Attack Scrappy)
I don't care about the chems. (Let Scrappy have them)
It sounds like you really care about your job. (Don't give yourself up)
Yes, I have some information for you. (Betray Orik)
You should forget about Orik. There's nothing to worry about. (Protect Orik)
Caldrim sent me. He said there might be a problem. (Give yourself up)
I see. But, I have orders. No witnesses. (Attack Kid)
Yes. I've got orders for you. You're to return to Goliet. (Lie)
Angrim was behind the trouble. (Reveal Angrim's participation)
Do as you think best. (Hide Angrim's participation)
No. This is nothing to do with me. (Don't offer to help)
Maybe they would listen to me? (Offer to help)
What are you talking about? (Cover for yourself)
I was an Alb. But, I'm free from Elex now. (Give yourself up)
Give me the Elex. Now. (Attack Kral)
They are...to the north, near the Converter. (Lie)
They are to the west. Where you said they would be. (Truth)
Ornir is stealing technology from the Pit and selling it. (Betray Ornir)
